author.bio: WPCampus is a community of web professionals, educators, and others dedicated to the growth of WordPress in higher education. Our mission is to advance colleges and universities by providing a support structure and wealth of knowledge for anyone who uses, or is interested in using, WordPress.

wordpressPost.title: WPCampus 2019 sessions will be live streamed for free
wordpressPost.excerpt: Registration for WPCampus 2019 may be closed but no worries! You can still attend many of our amazing sessions virtually. With the exception of workshops, sessions from WPCampus 2019 will...
wordpressPost.content:
Registration for WPCampus 2019 may be closed but no worries! You can still attend many of our amazing sessions virtually.

With the exception of workshops, sessions from WPCampus 2019 will be live streamed with captioning, thanks to the generous support of our partners at Pantheon.

Visit the watch page on Friday, July 26 and Saturday, July 27 to join in on the fun. We’ll have 2 full days of sessions focused on accessibility and WordPress in higher education.

Explore the schedule ahead of time to plan your day. Book a few rooms on campus and watch the event with other web professionals on your campus.

  • Explore the WPCampus 2019 schedule
  • Watch WPCampus 2019 sessions
